home.title: Welcome on
home.data-typed-items: write surveys, edit your surveys, share your surveys, see the results of your surveys
home.second: Customize your survey the way you want

cards.title: Features
cards.text1: Create your own survey and share it with your friends to plan your future actions
cards.text2: Edit your survey at any time, and correct your mistakes quickly
cards.text3: Display your survey results in a clear and organized way

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: To delete the account you will be asked for a confirmation. After deletion all data related to your account will be deleted. We do not store your password, but a hash of it, no one will be aware of it.
profile.warning-delete: Are you sure you want to delete the account?
profile.thanksgiving: Thank you for using this service

surveys.title: Dashboard

share.title: Share this survey
share.body: Share this link to get your friends to participate.i

surveys.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this survey?
surveys.name: Name

error.username-regex-error: The username must be between 2 and 20 characters, maybe you have entered a forbidden symbol
error.password-regex-error: The password must be at least 8 characters long, must contain 1 or more uppercase letters, lowercase letters and numbers. Finally, at least one of these symbols:
error.username-already-used: The username you entered already exists
error.empty-survey: This poll does not exist or is empty
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to make this request, or there has been a general error
